en: Once you remove the constraint for the successor operation, the operation can be rescheduled automatically.
de: Sobald Sie die Einschränkung für die Nachfolgeroperation aufheben, kann diese automatisch neu geplant werden.

en: As long as you have not configured the tenant, you can use only administration features of SAP Data Warehouse Cloud (but you cannot create spaces in the Space Management page).

en: All resources in your area of responsibility will be displayed.

en: A payment clearing group is an attribute with which you can categorize your suppliers and customers into groups.

en: Select the corresponding checkbox for demand-driven MRP components and/or top-level materials.

en: Control your union in the Mappings section of its side panel:

en: To lock a specific release of a data product, open the release history of the selected product, select the release you want to lock and select the checkbox Locked.

en: Retrieve your favorite data providers and data products.

en: The Product Allocation Order Items card displays only those order items with confirmation quantity assigned to a characteristic value combination containing the specified characteristic or values.

en: To guarantee a smooth roll-out of updates to any object without immediately affecting or even breaking fact models, consumption models, or perspectives, you can derive versions of objects.
de: Um einen reibungslosen Roll-out von Updates für beliebige Objekte zu gewährleisten, ohne dabei Faktmodelle, Verbrauchsmodelle oder Perspektiven unmittelbar zu beeinträchtigen oder gar zu zerstören, können Sie Versionen der Objekte ableiten.

en: You can display the reference quantity and the simulation quantity side by side.

en: The inspector detects issues for each top-level material per time period.

en: Any path used with this connection will be prefixed with this root path.

en: It must be unique for the clause type in each language.
de: Es muss für jeden Klauseltyp in jeder Sprache eindeutig sein.

en: Enables you to indicate if the acceptance of an ordered item is to take place at the point of origin.

en: Provide all the mandatory details such as the Pricing Date, Currency, and Quantity, and choose Simulate.

en: In each condition record where you define a scale value, you can further specify the scale type.

en: To manage your products and licenses, to publish new releases, and to maintain your data provider profile page, the Data Sharing Cockpit offers you tailored apps for each task and workflow.
de: Um Ihre Produkte und Lizenzen zu verwalten, neue Versionen zu veröffentlichen und Ihr Datenprovider-Profil zu pflegen, bietet Ihnen das Data Sharing Cockpit maßgeschneiderte Apps für jede Aufgabe und jeden Arbeitsablauf an.

en: Save or publish a release.

en: Read the messages to understand if there are any errors or warnings, if the actions you performed on the template were successful, if further action is required from you, and so on.

en: Resolve the memory issues by deleting unecessary data in your space or by assigning more memory to your space.

en: Modify the properties of objects, including providing business names for them to make them easier to identify and use for non-technical users.
de: Ändern Sie die Eigenschaften von Objekten, einschließlich der Vergabe betriebswirtschaftlicher Namen, um sie für nicht-technische Benutzer einfacher identifizierbar und nutzbar zu machen.
